help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions

general.title: General
general.whatIsRaffAnswer: Raff is a platform that connects Saudi shoppers with trending products from verified merchants on Salla and Zid. We help you discover products and redirect you to the merchant's store to complete your purchase.
general.howItWorksAnswer: Browse our curated collection of trending products, add items to your cart, and when you're ready to buy, we'll redirect you to the merchant's official store to complete the purchase securely.
general.isFreeAnswer: Yes! Raff is completely free for shoppers. You pay the same price as buying directly from the merchant's store.

shopping.title: Shopping
shopping.howToBuyAnswer: Add products to your cart, then click 'Buy Now' to be redirected to the merchant's store where you can complete your purchase using their payment methods.
shopping.paymentAnswer: Payment is handled directly by each merchant on their store. They typically accept credit cards, debit cards, and other local payment methods.
shopping.returnsAnswer: Return policies are set by each individual merchant. Please check the merchant's return policy on their store before making a purchase.

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.trackOrder: How do I track my order?
tracking.trackOrderAnswer: You can view your order history by logging into your Raff account. For detailed tracking, use the tracking link provided by the merchant or visit their store directly.
tracking.orderHistory: Where can I see my order history?
tracking.orderHistoryAnswer: Log into your account and navigate to 'My Orders' to see all your past purchases and their current status.
tracking.orderStatus: What do the order statuses mean?
tracking.orderStatusAnswer: Pending: Order placed; Confirmed: Merchant confirmed; Processing: Being prepared; Shipped: On the way; Delivered: Completed; Cancelled/Refunded: Order cancelled or money returned.

merchants.title: For Merchants
merchants.joinMerchant: How do I join as a merchant?
merchants.joinMerchantAnswer: Click 'Join as Merchant' and connect your Salla or Zid store using our secure OAuth integration. Your products will be synced automatically.
merchants.integrationAnswer: No! We use OAuth for one-click integration. Just click 'Connect', authorize Raff on your store platform, and your products will sync automatically. No technical knowledge required.
merchants.pricing: Is there a cost to join?
merchants.pricingAnswer: Joining Raff is free! Connect your store and start showcasing your products. We operate on a subscription model with different tiers to help you grow your business.
